DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy user preference Newport AutoSet Her female obstructive sleep apnea ( OSA ) patient . Efficacy evaluate compare apnea hypopnea index ( AHI ) oxygen desaturation index ( ODI ) Newport AutoSet Her algorithm standard algorithm . User preference evaluate subjective feedback relate comfort , ease fall asleep , sleep disturbance feeling refresh .
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal female age ≥ 18 year Current positive airway pressure ( PAP ) ( CPAP APAP ) therapy user 'current ' defined PAP therapy least 1 month prior study entry Diagnostic PSG available Diagnosis mildmoderate OSA ( AHI ≤ 30 ) Participants willing able give write inform consent Participants currently use Bilevel PAP Participants currently use supplemental oxygen Participants pregnant Subjects pre exist lung disease/ condition would predispose pneumothorax ( example : COPD , lung cancer ; fibrosis lung ; recent ( < 2years ) case pneumonia lung infection ; lung injury ) Participants researcher believe unsuitable inclusion either : comprehend English unable provide write informed consent physically unable comply protocol
